00071 static const USBTIMER_Callback_TypeDef hcTimeoutFunc[ MAX_NUM_HOSTCHANNELS ]=
00072 {
00073   Timeout0, Timeout1, Timeout2, Timeout3, Timeout4, Timeout5,

00078 static void Timeout( int hcnum )
00079 {
00080   uint32_t hcchar;
00081   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00082   USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00083 
00084   hc = &hcs[ hcnum ];
00085   hcchar = USBHHAL_GetHcChar( hcnum );
00086   ep = hc->ep;
00087 
00088   if ( ep->type != USB_EPTYPE_INTR )
00089   {
00090     USBHHAL_HCHalt( hcnum, hcchar );
00091     hc->status |= HCS_TIMEOUT;
00092     ep->timeout = 0;
00093     if ( !hc->idle )
00094       USBHEP_TransferDone( hc->ep, USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT );
00095   }
00096   else
00097   {
00098     if ( !ep->timeout )
00099     {
00100       /* Restart the channel */
00101       USBHHAL_HCStart( hcnum );
00102       USBTIMER_Start( hcnum + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
00103                       ep->epDesc.bInterval, hcTimeoutFunc[ hcnum ] );
00104     }
00105     else
00106     {
00107       ep->timeout -= EFM32_MIN( ep->timeout, ep->epDesc.bInterval );
00108       if ( ep->timeout )
00109       {
00110         /* Restart the channel */
00111         USBHHAL_HCStart( hcnum );
00112         USBTIMER_Start( hcnum + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
00113                         EFM32_MIN( ep->timeout, ep->epDesc.bInterval ),
00114                         hcTimeoutFunc[ hcnum ] );
00115       }
00116       else
00117       {
00118         USBHHAL_HCHalt( hcnum, hcchar );
00119         hc->status |= HCS_TIMEOUT;
00120         if ( !hc->idle )
00121           USBHEP_TransferDone( hc->ep, USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT );
00122       }
00123     }
00124   }
00125 }

00129 /***************************************************************************/
00150 int USBH_AssignHostChannel( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, uint8_t hcnum )
00151 {
00152   ep->type        = ep->epDesc.bmAttributes & CONFIG_DESC_BM_TRANSFERTYPE;
00153   ep->in          = ( ep->epDesc.bEndpointAddress & USB_SETUP_DIR_MASK ) != 0;
00154   ep->packetSize  = ep->epDesc.wMaxPacketSize;
00155   ep->addr        = ep->epDesc.bEndpointAddress;
00156   ep->state       = H_EP_IDLE;
00157 
00158   if ( ep == NULL )
00159   {
00160     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_AssignHostChannel(),"
00161                         " ep NULL pointer" );
00162     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00163     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00164   }
00165 
00166   if ( hcnum >= MAX_NUM_HOSTCHANNELS )
00167   {
00168     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_AssignHostChannel(),"
00169                         " Illegal host channel number" );
00170     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00171     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00172   }
00173 
00174   if ( ep->in )
00175   {
00176     ep->hcIn  = hcnum;
00177   }
00178   else
00179   {
00180     ep->hcOut = hcnum;
00181   }
00182 
00183   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00184 }

00186 /***************************************************************************/
00236 int USBH_ControlMsg( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep,
00237                      uint8_t bmRequestType,
00238                      uint8_t bRequest,
00239                      uint16_t wValue,
00240                      uint16_t wIndex,
00241                      uint16_t wLength,
00242                      void *data,
00243                      int timeout,
00244                      USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback )
00245 {
00246   if ( ep == NULL )
00247   {
00248     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), ep NULL pointer" );
00249     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00250     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00251   }
00252 
00253   if ( !USBH_DeviceConnected() )
00254   {
00255     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), No device connected" );
00256     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00257   }
00258 
00259   if ( (uint32_t)data & 3 )
00260   {
00261     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), Misaligned data buffer" );
00262     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00263     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00264   }
00265 
00266   INT_Disable();
00267   if ( ep->state != H_EP_IDLE )
00268   {
00269     INT_Enable();
00270     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), Endpoint is busy" );
00271     return USB_STATUS_EP_BUSY;
00272   }
00273 
00274   if ( !hcs[ ep->hcIn ].idle || !hcs[ ep->hcOut ].idle )
00275   {
00276     INT_Enable();
00277     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsg(), Host channel is busy" );
00278     return USB_STATUS_HC_BUSY;
00279   }
00280 
00281   ep->setup.bmRequestType = bmRequestType;
00282   ep->setup.bRequest      = bRequest;
00283   ep->setup.wValue        = wValue;
00284   ep->setup.wIndex        = wIndex;
00285   ep->setup.wLength       = wLength;
00286 
00287   ep->xferCompleted  = false;
00288   ep->state          = H_EP_SETUP;
00289   ep->xferCompleteCb = callback;
00290   ep->buf            = data;
00291   ep->xferred        = 0;
00292   ep->timeout        = timeout;
00293   ep->setupErrCnt    = 0;
00294 
00295   if ( timeout )
00296   {
00297     USBTIMER_Start( ep->hcOut + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
00298                     timeout, hcTimeoutFunc[ ep->hcOut ] );
00299   }
00300 
00301   USBH_CtlSendSetup( ep );
00302 
00303   INT_Enable();
00304 
00305   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00306 }

00308 /***************************************************************************/
00357 int USBH_ControlMsgB( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep,
00358                       uint8_t bmRequestType,
00359                       uint8_t bRequest,
00360                       uint16_t wValue,
00361                       uint16_t wIndex,
00362                       uint16_t wLength,
00363                       void *data,
00364                       int timeout )
00365 {
00366   int retVal;
00367 
00368   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
00369   {
00370     INT_Enable();
00371     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ControlMsgB() called with int's disabled" );
00372     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00373     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00374   }
00375 
00376   retVal = USBH_ControlMsg( ep,
00377                             bmRequestType,
00378                             bRequest,
00379                             wValue,
00380                             wIndex,
00381                             wLength,
00382                             data,
00383                             timeout,
00384                             NULL );
00385   INT_Enable();
00386 
00387   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
00388   {
00389     while ( ! ep->xferCompleted );
00390 
00391     if ( ( retVal = ep->xferStatus ) == USB_STATUS_OK )
00392     {
00393       retVal = ep->xferred;
00394     }
00395   }
00396 
00397   return retVal;
00398 }

00402 USB_Status_TypeDef USBH_CtlReceiveData( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, uint16_t length )
00403 {
00404   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00405 
00406   ep->in = true;
00407   ep->toggle = USB_PID_DATA1;
00408   ep->remaining = length;
00409 
00410   hc = &hcs[ ep->hcIn ];
00411   hc->buf = ep->buf;
00412   hc->xferred = 0;
00413   hc->remaining = length;
00414 
00415   USBHHAL_HCStart( ep->hcIn );
00416 
00417   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00418 }

00420 #if defined( USB_RAW_API )
00421 int USBH_CtlRxRaw( uint8_t pid, USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount )
00422 {
00423   uint16_t  packets, len;
00424   int       hcnum, retval;
00425   uint32_t  hcchar, status;
00426 
00427   hcnum = ep->hcIn;
00428   if ( byteCount > 0 )
00429     packets = ( byteCount + ep->packetSize - 1 ) / ep->packetSize;
00430   else
00431     packets = 1;
00432   len = packets * ep->packetSize;
00433 
00434   INT_Disable();
00435 
00436   USB->HC[ hcnum ].INTMSK = USB_HC_INT_STALL | USB_HC_INT_NAK | USB_HC_INT_ACK;
00437   USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;      /* Clear all interrupt flags      */
00438   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00439   USB->HAINTMSK |= 1 << hcnum;            /* Enable host channel interrupt  */
00440   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR =                 /* Program HCCHAR register        */
00441       ( ep->parentDevice->addr     <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_DEVADDR_SHIFT     ) |
00442       ( ( ep->addr & USB_EPNUM_MASK ) << _USB_HC_CHAR_EPNUM_SHIFT      ) |
00443       ( ep->type                   <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_EPTYPE_SHIFT      ) |
00444       ( ep->packetSize             <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_MPS_SHIFT         ) |
00445       ( USB_HC_CHAR_EPDIR                                              ) |
00446       ( ep->parentDevice->speed ==
00447                            HPRT_L_SPEED >> _USB_HPRT_PRTSPD_SHIFT
00448                                     ?   USB_HC_CHAR_LSPDDEV       : 0  );
00449   USB->HC[ hcnum ].TSIZ =
00450           ( ( len     << _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT ) &
00451                          _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_MASK       ) |
00452           ( ( packets << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT   ) &
00453                          _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_MASK         ) |
00454           ( ( pid     << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_SHIFT      ) &
00455                          _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_MASK            );
00456   USB->HC[ hcnum ].DMAADDR = (uint32_t)data;
00457   hcchar = ( USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR & ~USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS ) | USB_HC_CHAR_CHENA;
00458   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = hcchar;
00459 
00460   /* Start polling for interrupt */
00461   retval = USB_STATUS_EP_ERROR;
00462   while ( ( USBHAL_GetCoreInts() & USB_GINTSTS_HCHINT ) == 0 ){}
00463   if ( USBHHAL_GetHostChannelInts() & ( 1 << hcnum ) )
00464   {
00465     status = USBHHAL_GetHcInts( hcnum );
00466     hcchar |= USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS;
00467     USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = hcchar;
00468     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INTMSK = 0;
00469     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00470 
00471     if ( status & USB_HC_INT_STALL )
00472       retval = USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED;
00473     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_NAK )
00474       retval = USB_STATUS_EP_NAK;
00475     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_ACK )
00476       retval = USB_STATUS_OK;
00477   }
00478 
00479   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00480   INT_Enable();
00481 
00482   return retval;
00483 }
00484 #endif

00486 USB_Status_TypeDef USBH_CtlSendData( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, uint16_t length )
00487 {
00488   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00489 
00490   ep->in = false;
00491   ep->toggle = USB_PID_DATA1;

00495   hc->buf = ep->buf;
00496   hc->xferred = 0;

00503 
00504 USB_Status_TypeDef USBH_CtlSendSetup( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep )
00505 {
00506   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc;
00507 
00508   hc = &hcs[ ep->hcOut ];
00509   hc->buf = (uint8_t*)&ep->setup;
00510   hc->xferred = 0;
00511   hc->remaining = USB_SETUP_PKT_SIZE;
00512   hc->ep = ep;
00513   hcs[ ep->hcIn ].ep = ep;
00514 
00515   ep->toggle = USB_PID_SETUP;
00516   ep->remaining = USB_SETUP_PKT_SIZE;
00517 
00518   ep->in = true;
00519   USBHHAL_HCInit( ep->hcIn );
00520 
00521   ep->in = false;
00522   USBHHAL_HCInit( ep->hcOut );
00523 
00524   USBHHAL_HCStart( ep->hcOut );
00525 
00526   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00527 }

00529 #if defined( USB_RAW_API )
00530 int USBH_CtlTxRaw( uint8_t pid, USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount )
00531 {
00532   uint16_t  packets;
00533   int       hcnum, retval;
00534   uint32_t  hcchar, status;
00535 
00536   hcnum = ep->hcOut;
00537   if ( byteCount > 0 )
00538     packets = ( byteCount + ep->packetSize - 1 ) / ep->packetSize;
00539   else
00540     packets = 1;
00541 
00542   INT_Disable();
00543 
00544   USB->HC[ hcnum ].INTMSK = USB_HC_INT_STALL | USB_HC_INT_NAK | USB_HC_INT_ACK;
00545   USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;      /* Clear all interrupt flags      */
00546   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00547   USB->HAINTMSK |= 1 << hcnum;            /* Enable host channel interrupt  */
00548   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR =                 /* Program HCCHAR register        */
00549       ( ep->parentDevice->addr     <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_DEVADDR_SHIFT     ) |
00550       ( ( ep->addr & USB_EPNUM_MASK ) << _USB_HC_CHAR_EPNUM_SHIFT      ) |
00551       ( ep->type                   <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_EPTYPE_SHIFT      ) |
00552       ( ep->packetSize             <<   _USB_HC_CHAR_MPS_SHIFT         ) |
00553       ( ep->parentDevice->speed ==
00554                            HPRT_L_SPEED >> _USB_HPRT_PRTSPD_SHIFT
00555                                     ?   USB_HC_CHAR_LSPDDEV       : 0  );
00556   USB->HC[ hcnum ].TSIZ =
00557           ( ( byteCount << _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_SHIFT ) &
00558                            _USB_HC_TSIZ_XFERSIZE_MASK       ) |
00559           ( ( packets   << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_SHIFT   ) &
00560                            _USB_HC_TSIZ_PKTCNT_MASK         ) |
00561           ( ( pid       << _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_SHIFT      ) &
00562                            _USB_HC_TSIZ_PID_MASK            );
00563   USB->HC[ hcnum ].DMAADDR = (uint32_t)data;
00564   hcchar = ( USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR & ~USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS ) | USB_HC_CHAR_CHENA;
00565   USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = hcchar;
00566 
00567   /* Start polling for interrupt */
00568   retval = USB_STATUS_EP_ERROR;
00569   while ( ( USBHAL_GetCoreInts() & USB_GINTSTS_HCHINT ) == 0 ){}
00570   if ( USBHHAL_GetHostChannelInts() & ( 1 << hcnum ) )
00571   {
00572     status = USBHHAL_GetHcInts( hcnum );
00573     hcchar |= USB_HC_CHAR_CHDIS;
00574     USB->HC[ hcnum ].CHAR = hcchar;
00575     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INTMSK = 0;
00576     USB->HC[ hcnum ].INT = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00577 
00578     if ( status & USB_HC_INT_STALL )
00579       retval = USB_STATUS_EP_STALLED;
00580     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_NAK )
00581       retval = USB_STATUS_EP_NAK;
00582     else if ( status & USB_HC_INT_ACK )
00583       retval = USB_STATUS_OK;
00584   }
00585 
00586   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00587   INT_Enable();
00588 
00589   return retval;
00590 }

00637 int USBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device,
00638                                       void *buf, int len,
00639                                       uint8_t configIndex )
00640 {
00641   if ( device == NULL )
00642   {
00643     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB(),"
00644                         " device NULL pointer" );
00645     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00646     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00647   }
00648 
00649   if ( buf == NULL )
00650   {
00651     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB(),"
00652                         " buf NULL pointer" );
00653     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00654     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00655   }
00656 
00657   return USBH_ControlMsgB( &device->ep0,
00658                     USB_SETUP_DIR_D2H | USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE |
00659                     USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD_MASK,         /* bmRequestType */
00660                     GET_DESCRIPTOR,                       /* bRequest      */
00661                     (USB_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR << 8) | configIndex,/* wValue   */
00662                     0,                                    /* wIndex        */
00663                     len,                                  /* wLength       */
00664                     buf,                                  /* void* data    */
00665                     DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT );               /* int timeout   */
00666 }

00769 int USBH_GetStringB( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device, uint8_t *buf, int bufLen,
00770                      uint8_t stringIndex, uint16_t langID )
00771 {
00772   int retVal;
00773   USB_StringDescriptor_TypeDef* sd;
00774 
00775   if ( device == NULL )
00776   {
00777     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_GetStringB(), device NULL pointer" );
00778     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00779     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00780   }
00781 
00782   if ( buf == NULL )
00783   {
00784     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_GetStringB(), buf NULL pointer" );
00785     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00786     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00787   }
00788 
00789   retVal = USBH_ControlMsgB(
00790                     &device->ep0,
00791                     USB_SETUP_DIR_D2H | USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE |
00792                     USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD_MASK,         /* bmRequestType */
00793                     GET_DESCRIPTOR,                       /* bRequest      */
00794                     (USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR << 8) | stringIndex,/* wValue   */
00795                     langID,                               /* wIndex        */
00796                     EFM32_MIN( bufLen, 255 ),             /* wLength       */
00797                     buf,                                  /* void* data    */
00798                     DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT );               /* int timeout   */
00799 
00800   if ( retVal > 2 )
00801   {
00802     sd = (USB_StringDescriptor_TypeDef*)buf;
00803     if ( sd->len )
00804     {
00805       sd->name[ (sd->len - 2) / sizeof( char16_t ) ] = '\0';
00806     }
00807   }
00808   return retVal;
00809 }
00810 
00811 /***************************************************************************/
00827 int USBH_Init( const USBH_Init_TypeDef *p )
00828 {
00829   if ( p == NULL )
00830   {
00831     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Init(), init struct NULL pointer" );
00832     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00833     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00834   }
00835 
00836   if ( (    p->rxFifoSize   < MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INBYTES )
00837        || ( p->nptxFifoSize < MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INBYTES )
00838        || ( p->ptxFifoSize  < MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INBYTES )
00839        || ( (p->rxFifoSize + p->nptxFifoSize + p->ptxFifoSize) >
00840             (MAX_HOST_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS * 4) ) )
00841   {
00842     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Init(), Illegal Tx/Rx FIFO memory configuration" );
00843     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00844     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00845   }
00846   USBH_initData = *p;
00847 
00848   CMU_ClockSelectSet( cmuClock_HF, cmuSelect_HFXO );
00849   USBTIMER_Init();
00850   USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_DISCONNECTED;
00851 
00852   /* Enable USB clock. */
00853   INT_Disable();
00854   CMU->CMD = CMU_CMD_USBCCLKSEL_HFCLKNODIV;
00855   CMU->HFCORECLKEN0 |= CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USB | CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USBC;
00856   INT_Enable();
00857 
00858   /* Enable USB interrupt. */
00859   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00860   NVIC_EnableIRQ( USB_IRQn );
00861 
00862   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00863 }
00864 
00865 /***************************************************************************/
00895 int USBH_InitDeviceData( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device,
00896                          const uint8_t *buf,
00897                          USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep,
00898                          int numEp,
00899                          uint8_t deviceSpeed )
00900 {
00901   int i;
00902 
00903   if ( device == NULL )
00904   {
00905     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_InitDeviceData(), device NULL pointer" );
00906     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00907     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00908   }
00909 
00910   memset( device, 0, sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ) );
00911 
00912   device->ep = ep;
00913   device->addr = 0;
00914   device->numEp = numEp;
00915   device->speed = deviceSpeed;
00916 
00917   device->ep0.packetSize = 8;
00918   if ( buf )      /* Copy EP0 data from buffer filled by USBH_QueryDevice() */
00919   {
00920     memcpy( &device->ep0,
00921             &((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->ep0, sizeof( USBH_Ep_TypeDef ) );
00922   }
00923   device->ep0.parentDevice = device;
00924   device->ep0.type = USB_EPTYPE_CTRL;
00925   device->ep0.hcOut = 0;
00926   device->ep0.hcIn = 1;
00927 
00928   if ( ep )
00929   {
00930     for ( i=0; i<numEp; i++ )
00931     {
00932       memset( &device->ep[i], 0, sizeof( USBH_Ep_TypeDef ) );
00933       device->ep[i].parentDevice = device;
00934       device->ep[i].toggle = USB_PID_DATA0;
00935     }
00936   }
00937 
00938   if ( buf )/* Copy descriptor data from buffer filled by USBH_QueryDevice() */
00939   {
00940     memcpy( &device->devDesc,
00941             &((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->devDesc, USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE );
00942     memcpy( &device->confDesc,
00943             &((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->confDesc, USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE );
00944     memcpy( &device->itfDesc,
00945             USBH_QGetInterfaceDescriptor( buf, 0, 0 ), USB_INTERFACE_DESCSIZE );
00946 
00947     if ( ep )
00948     {
00949       for ( i=0; i<numEp; i++ )
00950       {
00951         memcpy( &device->ep[i].epDesc,
00952                 USBH_QGetEndpointDescriptor( buf, 0, 0, i ),
00953                 USB_ENDPOINT_DESCSIZE );
00954       }
00955     }
00956   }
00957 
00958   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00959 }
00960 
00961 /***************************************************************************/
00972 int USBH_PortReset( void )
00973 {
00974   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
00975   {
00976     INT_Enable();
00977     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_PortReset() called with int's disabled" );
00978     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00979     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
00980   }
00981 
00982   USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_CONNECTED_RESETTING;
00983   USBHHAL_PortReset( true );
00984   INT_Enable();
00985   USBTIMER_DelayMs( 30 );                 /* USB Reset delay */
00986   INT_Disable();
00987   USBHHAL_PortReset( false );
00988   INT_Enable();
00989   USBTIMER_DelayMs( 10 );                 /* Reset recovery time */
00990   USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_DISCONNECTED;
00991 
00992   return USB_STATUS_OK;
00993 }
00994 
00995 /***************************************************************************/
01002 int USBH_PortResume( void )
01003 {
01004   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
01005   {
01006     INT_Enable();
01007     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_PortResume() called with int's disabled" );
01008     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01009     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01010   }
01011 
01012   USBHHAL_PortResume( true );
01013   INT_Enable();
01014   USBTIMER_DelayMs( 30 );
01015   INT_Disable();
01016   USBHHAL_PortResume( false );
01017   INT_Enable();
01018 
01019   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01020 }
01021 
01022 /***************************************************************************/
01026 void USBH_PortSuspend( void )
01027 {
01028   INT_Disable();
01029   USBHHAL_PortSuspend();
01030   INT_Enable();
01031 }
01032 
01035 int USBH_PortVbusOn( bool on )
01036 {
01037   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
01038   {
01039     INT_Enable();
01040     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_PortVbusOn() called with int's disabled" );
01041     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01042     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01043   }
01044 
01045   USBHHAL_VbusOn( on );
01046 
01047   if ( !on )
01048     USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_DISCONNECTED;
01049 
01050   INT_Enable();
01051   USBTIMER_DelayMs( PORT_VBUS_DELAY );
01052 
01053   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01054 }

01058 #if defined( USB_USE_PRINTF )
01059 /***************************************************************************/
01075 int USBH_PrintConfigurationDescriptor(
01076                             const USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef *config,
01077                             int maxLen )
01078 {
01079   char *c;
01080   int remaining;
01081 
01082   if ( config == NULL )
01083   {
01084     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_PrintConfigurationDescriptor(),"
01085                         " config NULL pointer" );
01086     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01087     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01088   }
01089 
01090   USB_PRINTF( "\n\nConfiguration descriptor:" );
01091   USB_PRINTF( "\n bLength              %d",     config->bLength             );
01092   USB_PRINTF( "\n bDescriptorType      0x%02X", config->bDescriptorType     );
01093   USB_PRINTF( "\n wTotalLength         %d",     config->wTotalLength        );
01094   USB_PRINTF( "\n bNumInterfaces       %d",     config->bNumInterfaces      );
01095   USB_PRINTF( "\n bConfigurationValue  %d",     config->bConfigurationValue );
01096   USB_PRINTF( "\n iConfiguration       %d",     config->iConfiguration      );
01097   USB_PRINTF( "\n bmAttributes         0x%02X", config->bmAttributes        );
01098   USB_PRINTF( "\n bMaxPower            %d\n",   config->bMaxPower           );
01099 
01100   maxLen -= config->bLength;
01101   if ( maxLen > 0 )
01102   {
01103     remaining = EFM32_MIN( config->wTotalLength - config->bLength, maxLen );
01104     if ( remaining > 0 )
01105     {
01106       USB_PUTCHAR( '\n' );
01107       c = (char*)(config + 1);
01108       while ( remaining-- )
01109       {
01110         USB_PRINTF( "0x%02X ", *c++ );
01111       }
01112       USB_PUTCHAR( '\n' );
01113     }
01114   }
01115 
01116   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01117 }

01234 
01235 #if defined( __ICCARM__ )
01236 #pragma diag_suppress=Pa039
01237 #endif
01238 /***************************************************************************/
01258 void USBH_PrintString( const char *pre,
01259                        const USB_StringDescriptor_TypeDef *s,
01260                        const char *post )
01261 {
01262   char *c;
01263 
01264   if ( pre )
01265   {
01266     USB_PUTS( pre );
01267   }
01268 
01269   if ( s )
01270   {
01271     c = (char*)&s->name;
01272     while ( *c )
01273     {
01274       USB_PUTCHAR( *c );
01275       c += 2;
01276     }
01277   }
01278 
01279   if ( post )
01280   {
01281     USB_PUTS( post );
01282   }
01283 }
01284 #if defined( __ICCARM__ )
01285 #pragma diag_default=Pa039
01286 #endif
01287 
01288  /*
01289   * A request for a configuration descriptor returns the configuration
01290   * descriptor, all interface descriptors, and endpoint descriptors for all
01291   * of the interfaces in a single request.
01292   * The first interface descriptor follows the configuration descriptor.
01293   * The endpoint descriptors for the first interface follow the first interface
01294   * descriptor.
01295   * If there are additional interfaces, their interface descriptor and endpoint
01296   * descriptors follow the first interface's endpoint descriptors.
01297   * Class-specific and/or vendor-specific descriptors follow the standard
01298   * descriptors they extend or modify.
01299   */
01300 
01301 /***************************************************************************/
01321 USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef *USBH_QGetConfigurationDescriptor(
01322                                     const uint8_t *buf, int configIndex )
01323 {
01324   int i;
01325   const uint8_t *start, *end;
01326   USB_DeviceDescriptor_TypeDef *dev;
01327 
01328   dev = USBH_QGetDeviceDescriptor( buf );
01329   if ( dev )
01330   {
01331     if ( configIndex < dev->bNumConfigurations )
01332     {
01333       /* Start of first configuration descriptor */
01334       start = buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef );
01335 
01336       /* Find end of avaiable data, NOTE: ep contains end of buf ! */
01337       end = EFM32_MIN(
01338           start + ((USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef*)start)->wTotalLength,
01339           (uint8_t*)(((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->ep));
01340 
01341       /* Scan through, looking for correct configuration descriptor */
01342       i = 0;
01343       while ( start < end )
01344       {
01345         if ( *start == 0 )
01346           return NULL;
01347 
01348         if ( ( *start     == USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE   ) &&
01349              ( *(start+1) == USB_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR )    )
01350         {
01351           if ( i == configIndex )
01352           {
01353             return (USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef*)start;
01354           }
01355         i++;
01356         }
01357 
01358         start += *start;
01359       }
01360     }
01361   }
01362   return NULL;
01363 }
01364 
01365 /***************************************************************************/
01377 USB_DeviceDescriptor_TypeDef *USBH_QGetDeviceDescriptor( const uint8_t *buf )
01378 {
01379   USB_DeviceDescriptor_TypeDef *dev = &((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->devDesc;
01380 
01381   if ( buf == NULL )
01382   {
01383     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_QGetDeviceDescriptor(), buf NULL pointer" );
01384     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01385     return NULL;
01386   }
01387 
01388   if ( ( dev->bLength         == USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE   ) &&
01389        ( dev->bDescriptorType == USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR )    )
01390   {
01391     return dev;
01392   }
01393   return NULL;
01394 }
01395 
01396 /***************************************************************************/
01424 USB_EndpointDescriptor_TypeDef *USBH_QGetEndpointDescriptor(
01425     const uint8_t *buf, int configIndex, int interfaceIndex, int endpointIndex )
01426 {
01427   int i;
01428   uint8_t *start, *end;
01429   USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef *itf;
01430 
01431   itf = USBH_QGetInterfaceDescriptor( buf, configIndex, interfaceIndex );
01432   if ( itf )
01433   {
01434     if ( endpointIndex < itf->bNumEndpoints )
01435     {
01436       /* First possible endpoint descriptor */
01437       start = (uint8_t*)itf + USB_INTERFACE_DESCSIZE;
01438 
01439       /* Search until start of next interface decsriptor, or to end of buf */
01440       end = (uint8_t*)USBH_QGetInterfaceDescriptor(
01441                                         buf, configIndex, interfaceIndex + 1 );
01442       if ( end == NULL )
01443       {
01444         /* NOTE: ep contains end of buf ! */
01445         end = (uint8_t*)((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->ep;
01446       }
01447 
01448       /* Scan through, looking for correct endpoint descriptor */
01449       i = 0;
01450       while ( start < end )
01451       {
01452         if ( *start == 0 )
01453           return NULL;
01454 
01455         if ( ( *start     == USB_ENDPOINT_DESCSIZE   ) &&
01456              ( *(start+1) == USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR )    )
01457         {
01458           if ( i == endpointIndex )
01459           {
01460             return (USB_EndpointDescriptor_TypeDef*)start;
01461           }
01462         i++;
01463         }
01464 
01465         start += *start;
01466       }
01467     }
01468   }
01469   return NULL;
01470 }
01471 
01472 /***************************************************************************/
01496 USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef *USBH_QGetInterfaceDescriptor(
01497                       const uint8_t *buf, int configIndex, int interfaceIndex )
01498 {
01499   int i;
01500   uint8_t *start, *end;
01501   USB_ConfigurationDescriptor_TypeDef *conf;
01502 
01503   conf = USBH_QGetConfigurationDescriptor( buf, configIndex );
01504   if ( conf )
01505   {
01506     if ( interfaceIndex < conf->bNumInterfaces )
01507     {
01508       /* First interface descriptor */
01509       start = (uint8_t*)conf + USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE;
01510 
01511       /* Search until start of next config decsriptor, or to end of buf */
01512       end = (uint8_t*)USBH_QGetConfigurationDescriptor( buf, configIndex + 1 );
01513       if ( end == NULL )
01514       {
01515         /* NOTE: ep contains end of buf ! */
01516         end = (uint8_t*)((USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf)->ep;
01517       }
01518 
01519       /* Scan through, looking for correct interface descriptor */
01520       i = 0;
01521       while ( start < end )
01522       {
01523         if ( *start == 0 )
01524           return NULL;
01525 
01526         if ( ( *start     == USB_INTERFACE_DESCSIZE   ) &&
01527              ( *(start+1) == USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR )    )
01528         {
01529           if ( ( i == interfaceIndex ) &&
01530                ( i ==
01531                  ((USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef*)start)->bInterfaceNumber ) )
01532           {
01533             return (USB_InterfaceDescriptor_TypeDef*)start;
01534           }
01535         i++;
01536         }
01537 
01538         start += *start;
01539       }
01540     }
01541   }
01542   return NULL;
01543 }
01544 
01545 /***************************************************************************/
01572 int USBH_QueryDeviceB( uint8_t *buf, size_t bufsize, uint8_t deviceSpeed )
01573 {
01574   USBH_Device_TypeDef *device = (USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf;
01575 
01576   USBH_InitDeviceData( device, NULL, NULL, 0, deviceSpeed );
01577 
01578   device->speed = deviceSpeed;
01579   device->ep = (USBH_Ep_TypeDef*)(buf+bufsize);/* Save buffer end addr here ! */
01580 
01581   /* Get the first 8 bytes of the device desc to figure out device EP0 size */
01582   if ( 8 != USBH_GetDeviceDescriptorB( device,
01583                                        &device->devDesc,
01584                                        EFM32_MIN( 8U, bufsize ) ) )
01585   {
01586     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
01587   }
01588   device->ep0.packetSize = device->devDesc.bMaxPacketSize0;
01589 
01590   /* Get entire device descriptor */
01591   if ( USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE != USBH_GetDeviceDescriptorB(
01592                            device,
01593                            buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ),
01594                            EFM32_MIN( (size_t)USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE, bufsize ) ) )
01595   {
01596     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
01597   }
01598   memcpy( &device->devDesc,
01599           buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ), USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE );
01600 
01601   /* Get configuration descriptor. */
01602   if ( USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE != USBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB(
01603                            device,
01604                            buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ),
01605                            EFM32_MIN( (size_t)USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE,
01606                                       bufsize - (size_t)USB_DEVICE_DESCSIZE ),
01607                            0 ) )
01608   {
01609     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
01610   }
01611   memcpy( &device->confDesc,
01612           buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ), USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE );
01613 
01614   /* Get complete configuration descriptor. NOTE: Descriptor data is    */
01615   /* appended at the end of the device data structure !                 */
01616   if ( ( USB_CONFIG_DESCSIZE + USB_INTERFACE_DESCSIZE ) >
01617        USBH_GetConfigurationDescriptorB(
01618                            device,
01619                            buf + sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef ),
01620                            EFM32_MIN( device->confDesc.wTotalLength,
01621                                       bufsize - sizeof( USBH_Device_TypeDef )),
01622                            0 ) )
01623   {
01624     return USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR;
01625   }
01626 
01627   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01628 }
01629 
01630 /***************************************************************************/
01662 int USBH_Read( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount, int timeout,
01663                USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback )
01664 {
01665   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc = &hcs[ ep->hcIn ];
01666 
01667   if ( ep == NULL )
01668   {
01669     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), ep NULL pointer" );
01670     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01671     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01672   }
01673 
01674   if ( !USBH_DeviceConnected() )
01675   {
01676     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), No device connected" );
01677     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01678   }
01679 
01680   if ( (   byteCount > MAX_XFER_LEN                           ) ||
01681        ( ( byteCount / ep->packetSize ) > MAX_PACKETS_PR_XFER )    )
01682   {
01683     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Illegal transfer size" );
01684     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01685     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01686   }
01687 
01688   if ( (uint32_t)data & 3 )
01689   {
01690     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Misaligned data buffer" );
01691     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01692     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01693   }
01694 
01695   INT_Disable();
01696   if ( ep->state != H_EP_IDLE )
01697   {
01698     INT_Enable();
01699     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Endpoint is busy" );
01700     return USB_STATUS_EP_BUSY;
01701   }
01702 
01703   if ( !ep->in )
01704   {
01705     INT_Enable();
01706     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Illegal EP direction" );
01707     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01708     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01709   }
01710 
01711   if ( !hc->idle )
01712   {
01713     INT_Enable();
01714     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Read(), Host channel is busy" );
01715     return USB_STATUS_HC_BUSY;
01716   }
01717 
01718   ep->xferCompleted  = false;
01719   ep->state          = H_EP_DATA_IN;
01720   ep->xferCompleteCb = callback;
01721   ep->buf            = data;
01722   ep->remaining      = byteCount;
01723   ep->xferred        = 0;
01724   ep->timeout        = timeout;
01725 
01726   hc->buf = data;
01727   hc->xferred = 0;
01728   hc->remaining = byteCount;
01729   hc->ep = ep;
01730 
01731   if ( ep->type == USB_EPTYPE_INTR )
01732   {
01733     if ( timeout )
01734       timeout = EFM32_MIN( timeout, ep->epDesc.bInterval );
01735     else
01736       timeout = ep->epDesc.bInterval;
01737   }
01738 
01739   if ( timeout )
01740   {
01741     USBTIMER_Start( ep->hcIn + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
01742                     timeout, hcTimeoutFunc[ ep->hcIn ] );
01743   }
01744 
01745   USBHHAL_HCInit( ep->hcIn );
01746   USBHHAL_HCStart( ep->hcIn );
01747 
01748   INT_Enable();
01749 
01750   return USB_STATUS_OK;
01751 }
01752 
01753 /***************************************************************************/
01784 int USBH_ReadB( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount, int timeout )
01785 {
01786   int retVal;
01787 
01788   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
01789   {
01790     INT_Enable();
01791     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_ReadB() called with int's disabled" );
01792     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01793     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01794   }
01795 
01796   retVal = USBH_Read( ep, data, byteCount, timeout, NULL );
01797   INT_Enable();
01798 
01799   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
01800   {
01801     while ( ! ep->xferCompleted );
01802 
01803     if ( ( retVal = ep->xferStatus ) == USB_STATUS_OK )
01804     {
01805       retVal = ep->xferred;
01806     }
01807   }
01808 
01809   return retVal;
01810 }

01812 /***************************************************************************/
01831 int USBH_SetAddressB( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device, uint8_t deviceAddress )
01832 {
01833   int retVal;
01834 
01835   if ( device == NULL )
01836   {
01837     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_SetAddressB(), device NULL pointer" );
01838     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01839     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01840   }
01841 
01842   if ( deviceAddress > USB_MAX_DEVICE_ADDRESS )
01843   {
01844     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_SetAddressB(), Illegal device address" );
01845     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01846     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01847   }
01848 
01849   retVal = USBH_ControlMsgB(
01850                     &device->ep0,
01851                     USB_SETUP_DIR_H2D | USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE |
01852                     USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD_MASK,         /* bmRequestType */
01853                     SET_ADDRESS,                          /* bRequest      */
01854                     deviceAddress,                        /* wValue        */
01855                     0,                                    /* wIndex        */
01856                     0,                                    /* wLength       */
01857                     NULL,                                 /* void* data    */
01858                     DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT );               /* int timeout   */
01859 
01860   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
01861   {
01862     device->addr = deviceAddress;
01863   }
01864   return retVal;
01865 }

01867 /***************************************************************************/
01887 int USBH_SetAltInterfaceB( USBH_Device_TypeDef *device,
01888                            uint8_t interfaceIndex, uint8_t alternateSetting )
01889 {
01890   int i, retVal;
01891 
01892   if ( device == NULL )
01893   {
01894     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_SetAltInterfaceB(), device NULL pointer" );
01895     EFM_ASSERT( false );
01896     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
01897   }
01898 
01899   retVal = USBH_ControlMsgB(
01900                     &device->ep0,
01901                     USB_SETUP_DIR_H2D | USB_SETUP_RECIPIENT_DEVICE |
01902                     USB_SETUP_TYPE_STANDARD_MASK,         /* bmRequestType */
01903                     SET_INTERFACE,                        /* bRequest      */
01904                     alternateSetting,                     /* wValue        */
01905                     interfaceIndex,                       /* wIndex        */
01906                     0,                                    /* wLength       */
01907                     NULL,                                 /* void* data    */
01908                     DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT );               /* int timeout   */
01909 
01910   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
01911   {
01912     // Alternate settings are mutually exclusive within the interface
01913 
01914     // We should:
01915     // Deactivate ep's in previous alternate interface setting
01916     // Activate ep's in the new alternate setting of the interface
01917 
01918     for ( i=0; i<device->numEp; i++ )           /* Reset all data toggles */
01919     {
01920       device->ep[i].toggle = USB_PID_DATA0;
01921     }
01922   }
01923 
01924   return retVal;
01925 }

02019 /***************************************************************************/
02026 void USBH_Stop( void )
02027 {
02028   int i;
02029 
02030   USBTIMER_Stop( HOSTPORT_TIMER_INDEX );
02031   for ( i = 0; i < NUM_HC_USED + 2; i++ )
02032   {
02033     USBTIMER_Stop( i + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX );
02034   }
02035   INT_Disable();
02036   USBHAL_DisableGlobalInt();
02037   INT_Enable();
02038   USBH_PortVbusOn( false );
02039   USBHAL_DisablePhyPins();
02040   /* Turn off USB clocks. */
02041   CMU->HFCORECLKEN0 &= ~(CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USB | CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USBC);
02042 }

02086 
02089 static void InitUsb( void )
02090 {
02091   int i;
02092 
02093   memset( hcs, 0, sizeof( hcs ) );
02094   for ( i = 0; i < NUM_HC_USED + 2; i++ )
02095   {
02096     hcs[ i ].idle = true;
02097   }
02098 
02099   INT_Disable();
02100   USBHHAL_CoreInit( USBH_initData.rxFifoSize, USBH_initData.nptxFifoSize,
02101                     USBH_initData.ptxFifoSize );
02102 
02103   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ( USB_IRQn );
02104   INT_Enable();
02105 }

02109 /***************************************************************************/
02136 int USBH_WaitForDeviceConnectionB( uint8_t *buf, int timeoutInSeconds )
02137 {
02138   bool xferError;
02139   USBH_Device_TypeDef *device;
02140   int accumulatedTime, deadLine;
02141 
02142   if ( buf == NULL )
02143   {
02144     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_WaitForDeviceConnectionB(),"
02145                         " buf NULL pointer" );
02146     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02147     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02148   }
02149 
02150   xferError = false;
02151   accumulatedTime = 0;
02152   USBH_attachRetryCount = 0;
02153   deadLine = timeoutInSeconds * 1000;
02154   device = (USBH_Device_TypeDef*)buf;
02155 
02156   while ( 1 )
02157   {
02158     /* If USB is enabled, turn it off. */
02159     if ( USBHHAL_InitializedAndPowered() )
02160     {
02161       USBH_PortVbusOn( false );
02162       if ( deadLine )
02163         accumulatedTime += PORT_VBUS_DELAY;
02164     }
02165 
02166     /* Reset and init USB core. */
02167     InitUsb();
02168     if ( deadLine )
02169       accumulatedTime += 50;
02170 
02171     /* Turn on VBUS. */
02172     USBH_PortVbusOn( true );
02173     DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '1' );
02174     if ( deadLine )
02175       accumulatedTime += PORT_VBUS_DELAY;
02176 
02177     /* Enable interrupts from USB core. */
02178     INT_Disable();
02179     USBHHAL_EnableInts();
02180     USBHAL_EnableGlobalInt();
02181     INT_Enable();
02182 
02183     /* Wait for device connection. */
02184     while ( 1 )
02185     {
02186       if ( USBH_DeviceConnected() )
02187         break;
02188 
02189       if ( ( deadLine                    ) &&
02190            ( accumulatedTime >= deadLine )    )
02191       {
02192         return USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT;
02193       }
02194 
02195 #if ( USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT != USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT_NONE )
02196       if ( GPIO_PinInGet( USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PORT, USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PIN ) ==
02197            USB_VBUSOVRCUR_POLARITY )
02198       {
02199         DEBUG_USB_INT_LO_PUTCHAR( '~' );
02200         USBHHAL_PortReset( false );
02201         USBHHAL_VbusOn( false );
02202         USBTIMER_Stop( HOSTPORT_TIMER_INDEX );
02203         USBH_portStatus = H_PORT_OVERCURRENT;
02204         return USB_STATUS_PORT_OVERCURRENT;
02205       }
02206 #endif
02207       USBTIMER_DelayMs( 50 );
02208       if ( deadLine )
02209         accumulatedTime += 50;
02210     }
02211 
02212     /* Reset recovery time. */
02213     USBTIMER_DelayMs( 10 );
02214     if ( deadLine )
02215       accumulatedTime += 10;
02216 
02217     /* Do one USB transfer to check if device connection is OK. */
02218 
02219     USBH_InitDeviceData( device, NULL, NULL, 0, USBH_GetPortSpeed() );
02220 
02221     /* Get the first 8 bytes of the device descriptor */
02222     if ( 8 == USBH_GetDeviceDescriptorB( device, &device->devDesc, 8  ) )
02223     {
02224       return USB_STATUS_OK;
02225     }
02226     else
02227     {
02228       xferError = true;
02229       if ( deadLine )
02230         accumulatedTime += DEFAULT_CTRL_TIMEOUT;
02231     }
02232 
02233     /* Disable USB, power down VBUS. */
02234     USBH_Stop();
02235     /* Enable USB clocks again, USBH_Stop() turns them off. */
02236     CMU->HFCORECLKEN0 |= CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USB | CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_USBC;
02237 
02238     if ( deadLine )
02239       accumulatedTime += PORT_VBUS_DELAY;
02240 
02241     if ( ( deadLine                    ) &&
02242          ( accumulatedTime >= deadLine )    )
02243       break;
02244 
02245     USBH_attachRetryCount = ( USBH_attachRetryCount + 1 ) %
02246                             ( sizeof( USBH_attachTiming ) /
02247                               sizeof( USBH_AttachTiming_TypeDef ) );
02248   }
02249 
02250   if ( xferError )
02251     return USB_STATUS_DEVICE_MALFUNCTION;
02252 
02253   return USB_STATUS_TIMEOUT;
02254 }
02255 
02256 /***************************************************************************/
02286 int USBH_Write( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount,
02287                 int timeout, USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback )
02288 {
02289   USBH_Hc_TypeDef *hc = &hcs[ ep->hcOut ];
02290 
02291   if ( ep == NULL )
02292   {
02293     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), ep NULL pointer" );
02294     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02295     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02296   }
02297 
02298   if ( !USBH_DeviceConnected() )
02299   {
02300     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), No device connected" );
02301     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02302   }
02303 
02304   if ( (   byteCount > MAX_XFER_LEN                           ) ||
02305        ( ( byteCount / ep->packetSize ) > MAX_PACKETS_PR_XFER )    )
02306   {
02307     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Illegal transfer size" );
02308     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02309     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02310   }
02311 
02312   if ( (uint32_t)data & 3 )
02313   {
02314     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Misaligned data buffer" );
02315     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02316     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02317   }
02318 
02319   INT_Disable();
02320   if ( ep->state != H_EP_IDLE )
02321   {
02322     INT_Enable();
02323     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Endpoint is busy" );
02324     return USB_STATUS_EP_BUSY;
02325   }
02326 
02327   if ( ep->in )
02328   {
02329     INT_Enable();
02330     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Illegal EP direction" );
02331     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02332     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02333   }
02334 
02335   if ( !hc->idle )
02336   {
02337     INT_Enable();
02338     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_Write(), Host channel is busy" );
02339     return USB_STATUS_HC_BUSY;
02340   }
02341 
02342   ep->xferCompleted  = false;
02343   ep->state          = H_EP_DATA_OUT;
02344   ep->xferCompleteCb = callback;
02345   ep->buf            = data;
02346   ep->remaining      = byteCount;
02347   ep->xferred        = 0;
02348   ep->timeout        = timeout;
02349 
02350   hc->buf = data;
02351   hc->xferred = 0;
02352   hc->remaining = byteCount;
02353   hc->ep = ep;
02354 
02355   if ( ep->type == USB_EPTYPE_INTR )
02356   {
02357     if ( timeout )
02358       timeout = EFM32_MIN( timeout, ep->epDesc.bInterval );
02359     else
02360       timeout = ep->epDesc.bInterval;
02361   }
02362 
02363   if ( timeout )
02364   {
02365     USBTIMER_Start( ep->hcOut + HOSTCH_TIMER_INDEX,
02366                     timeout, hcTimeoutFunc[ ep->hcOut ] );
02367   }
02368 
02369   USBHHAL_HCInit( ep->hcOut );
02370   USBHHAL_HCStart( ep->hcOut );
02371 
02372   INT_Enable();
02373 
02374   return USB_STATUS_OK;
02375 }
02376 
02377 /***************************************************************************/
02406 int USBH_WriteB( USBH_Ep_TypeDef *ep, void *data, int byteCount, int timeout )
02407 {
02408   int retVal;
02409 
02410   if ( INT_Disable() > 1 )
02411   {
02412     INT_Enable();
02413     DEBUG_USB_API_PUTS( "\nUSBH_WriteB() called with int's disabled" );
02414     EFM_ASSERT( false );
02415     return USB_STATUS_ILLEGAL;
02416   }
02417 
02418   retVal = USBH_Write( ep, data, byteCount, timeout, NULL );
02419   INT_Enable();
02420 
02421   if ( retVal == USB_STATUS_OK )
02422   {
02423     while ( ! ep->xferCompleted );
02424 
02425     if ( ( retVal = ep->xferStatus ) == USB_STATUS_OK )
02426     {
02427       retVal = ep->xferred;
02428     }
02429   }
02430 
02431   return retVal;
02432 }
